title: Generalized Short-Circuit Ratio
description: gSCR. Geeneralized representation of SCR for single-infeed power electronic systems (SIPESs) in multi-infeed power electronic systems (MIPESs).

sections.title: Definition in an Article
sections.body_md: > In other words, the small signal stability of the MIPES depends on the strength of the weakest equivalent SIPES, which can be quantified with the minimum eigenvalue $\lambda_1$ of matrix $Y_{eq}$ (extended admittance matrix).
